title: DDFP 327: The greatest Super Bowl ever
itunes:title: DDFP 327: The greatest Super Bowl ever
description:
Shek, Handsome Hank and producer Black Tie review Super Bowl XLIX from every angle as they discuss Tom Brady's fourth-quarter performance, the Seahawks' interception, Katy Perry's halftime show and much more. Plus, is Tom Brady the greatest QB ever and which two teams are favorites for Super Bowl 50? 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
